version_description:
- Account registration. No account, no problem!
- Course enrollment. Learn something new, today!
- Assorted bug fixes
Fixes an issue with displaying course start dates

Bug fixes

New in version 2.0:
Exams, quizzes and more course materials. You can now take basic assessments and interact with different course components. Start learning and testing your knowledge today.
Assorted bug fixes.
Now you can view and edit your learner profile. Share a little about yourself with other learners!

- Access course discussions to talk to your fellow learners or course staff.
- Find courses you want to take, using the new course search feature.

- Access course discussions to talk to your fellow learners or course staff.
- Find courses you want to take, using the new course search feature.
- Fix issue causing a crash for some users on sign in
Bug fixes.

- Inline discussions
- Bug fixes.

- Browse edX courses without needing to sign in or create an account.
- Discussion posts now include the post author’s profile picture as well as their linked username.
- Fix for an issue where expired tokens prevented enrollment in courses.
- Va

- The video player enters full screen mode as soon as device is rotated to landscape. Swipe on full screen videos to move to the next unit.
- For videos with transcripts, transcripts are available on portrait view only. Transcripts are searchable and s

- You can now share courses you’re taking, using Facebook or Twitter.
- Important course dates, including assignment deadlines, are now listed in the "Important Dates" section.
- A "What’s New" feature highlights changes that were made to the edX ap

- You can now share courses you’re taking, using Facebook or Twitter.
- Important course dates, including assignment deadlines, are now listed in the "Important Dates" section.
- A "What’s New" feature highlights changes that were made to the edX ap
- Stability Improvements and Bug Fixes.

- The "Videos" tab in each course's menu replaces "My Videos" in the main menu. Now you can view all the videos in a course in one place!
- Swipe left to delete downloaded videos.

- A simplified main menu makes it easier to access and discover courses.
- You can now see due dates for assignments in the course outline.
- We now have initial iPad support so that you can interact with course content and watch videos on a larger

- Quickly jump to course videos, discussions, and important dates in your course using new in-course navigation.
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- Quickly access your courses or discover new courses using the new application navigation.
- Easily download all videos within a course using the new toggle control.
- General improvements and bug fixes.
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- Easily download all videos within a subsection using the new toggle controls.
- Video streaming quality will now adapt based on your network. Improve video quality even further by connecting to a WiFi network!
- General improvements and bug fixe
- General improvements and bug fixes

- You can now rotate your iPhone or iPad for improved viewing on most areas of the application.
- Browse courses by subject when you are looking for new learning experiences!
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- You can now view your edX programs on the go!
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- Accessibility improvements.
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- Accessibility improvements
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- You can now search edX programs and degrees using the mobile application!
- General improvements and bug fixes.
- General improvements and bug fixes.
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- 您现在可以用德语, 希伯来语，法语，葡萄牙语，中文和土耳其语查看edX应用程序。 edX应用程序将依照您的设备设置设定中文
- 一般改进和错误修复。

- 想在大一点儿的屏幕上观看课程视频？我们添加了 Chromecast 支持，现在可以在大屏幕上看了!
- 厌倦了得离开应用才能观看 YouTube 课程视频？现在，您可以使用应用内播放器观看视频了.
- 您现在可以使用 Microsoft 帐户注册或登录了.
- 一般改进和错误修复。

- We’ve added more options for controlling video speed to meet your needs.
- We’ve heard you! Now you can rewind or forward videos to get to the exact point where it matters.
- My Courses screen is now optimized to work on iPads.
- General improv

- We've improved the way you search for and enroll in your favorite courses & programs.
- Now you can use your Apple ID to register and sign in to our platform. Sweet, isn't it?
- General improvements and bug fixes.

- We’ve modernized our look and started making updates that make it easier for you to achieve your learning goals.
